entry.title: fatal: remote origin already exists
entry.content:
D:\Github\taohill_deploy.git> git remote -v origin upstream

D:\Github\taohill_deploy.git> git remote set-url origin git@github.com:taohill/taohill.github.com.git D:\Github\taohill_deploy.git> git remote -v origin git@github.com:taohill/taohill.github.com.git (fetch) origin git@github.com:taohill/taohill.github.com.git (push) upstream

D:\Github\taohill_deploy.git> notepad .\config [core]

repositoryformatversion = 0
filemode = false
bare = false
logallrefupdates = true
symlinks = false
ignorecase = true
hideDotFiles = dotGitOnly

[remote “origin”]

url = git@github.com:taohill/taohill.github.com.git

[branch “master”]

remote = origin
merge = refs/heads/master
